divs: Sighting Detailsi whas smoking my last siggaret for the night looking at the stars , i saw somthing what looked like a star was movig around, it has been comming back almost every night it flyes more and more others past the night sky every night , blinking slowly as they fly by like smal stars and then stops and moves on again. i dont know what to say about it, just facinating. it whas cold outside and i had to sleep, so i went back to bed. and i fell fast to sleep. im not best in writing english sorry about that. i have no photos of it, just on film.. -rolf-
